On This Page

    About This Project

    Here is a site for a coffee shop selling their roasted beans. It also features a page discussing a coffee subscription program that delivers a selected variety of coffee beans.

    The product page features a modified product widget to display coffee aspects for customers. There is a customized about page as well.
